description:
*** Includes 10 New Tracks for Ground Effect! ***

For those capable few who have mastered Ground Effect, will you rise to the challenge, to become a Pro & take the chance to play 10 new levels in the first game on your phone in Stereoscopic 3D (3D glasses required)? A total of 14 challenging levels await you with big jumps, steep drops and twisting paths to master.

Stunning visuals and a pumping sound track make this ground-breaking game the way perfect way to show off what your phone can do! Already downloaded over 1 million times on mobile platforms and nominated last year for a Best App Ever Award on iPhone, this is fast-paced, arcade style ekranoplan racing action at it's very best. Boasting incredible 3D graphic detail and procedural landscapes never before seen in any game of its type, the game will appeal to lovers of fast-paced, competitive action genres as well as those who prefer something more sedate and relaxing. 

Get your adrenaline going as you hunt down your opponents one by one in an attempt to take a medal and unlock the next track. Or you can challenge your previous best time in a head to head ghost race. Alternatively, simply ignore the markers and guidance and choose to explore the road less travelled. Whichever path you choose, you're guaranteed a beautiful journey!

v1.0.1 includes big performance improvement, particularly for Pixi, fix for multitouch and music info now displayed in Sound menu as well as other miscellaneous fixes.

[Please note optional Stereoscopic 3D mode requires 3D glasses of the red/cyan, yellow/blue or green/magenta variety. Green/Magenta best. The game can be played just fine without 3D glasses.]
